title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - July 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for July 2019. All Pixel devices running Android 9 will receive these software updates as part of the July OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview : 

Build Number: 
Pixel 1 (XL) / Pixel 2 (XL): PQ3A.190705.001
Pixel 3 (XL): PQ3A.190705.003
Pixel 3a (XL): PQ3B.190705.003
Noteable fixes: 
Unicode Japanese language support improvements (all Pixel devices)
Fixes for some Pixel 3 (XL) and Pixel 3a (XL) devices stuck in the Google logo during boot
Fixes for some Pixel 3 (XL) and Pixel 3a (XL) devices stuck in emergency download mode (EDL) with blank screen
Titan M module improvements for Pixel 3 (XL) and Pixel 3a (XL) devices
'Ok Google' & music detection improvements for Pixel 2 (XL), Pixel 3 (XL) and Pixel 3a (XL) devices

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
